subject: RE: [Assistant] Payment Proposal - 13 Werona Road  Riverview  New South Wales 2066 Australia - ACCEPTED
preview: Hi Sophie and Adam, I have looked into this and there is not obvious place that this could have occurred. Here is a quick video to run you through the logs: https://www.loom.com/share/f7dbf785d9624

full_threads.body:
Hi Sophie and Adam, 

I have looked into this and there is not obvious place that this could have occurred. 

Here is a quick video to run you through the logs: 
https://www.loom.com/share/f7dbf785d9624ddea8280f9998b4b3da

As this seems to be an isolated incident, let's just keep an eye on it, and if it happens again, please let me know straight away so that I can reverse engineer the problem.
@heath Can we chat about this? I don't have access with the Xero stuff.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Guys

Can I pls get a response on the below

Kind Regards,

Sophie Bekkeli

Assistant to Senior Stylist

Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:



P 02 9310 1611

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

PO Box 7125, ALEXANDRIA NSW 2015

www.advantagestyling.com.au

No, I will follow them up now. I believe the amount she paid is the correct amount as that was the cost of the quote

Kind Regards,

Sophie Bekkeli

Hi Sophie


Did you receive a reply to this?


From: Sophie Bekkeli <sophie@advantagestyling.com.au>
Sent: Monday, 8 November 2021 10:18 AM
To: WP Perk Support <support@wpperk.com>
Cc: Adam Fonseca <adam@advantagestyling.com.au>; Jasmine Killey <jasmine@advantagestyling.com.au>
Subject: FW: [Assistant] Payment Proposal - 13 Werona Road Riverview New South Wales 2066 Australia - ACCEPTED


Hi Guys


Can someone please explain this... We received sign off for this proposal and the price is $7675.72 however the invoice that was automatically generated in Xero from the sign off was for $114 less ($7561.72). Is there anyway to see if this was a problem on our end or Xero's? I cant see any reason why the invoice would be less.


Kind Regards,

Sophie Bekkeli
Assistant to Senior Stylist
Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:


P 02 9310 1611
Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019
PO Box 7125, ALEXANDRIA NSW 2015
www.advantagestyling.com.au
